title: Financial close of Thar Block-2 power plant in September end: Bajwa
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP): Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting Lt. Gen (Retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa on Tuesday said that the financial closes of 330 Megawatts (MW) Thar Block-2 power plant was expected in September end.
The project to be executed by Thal Nova and HUBCO was launched recently with an Investment $ 500 million.
In a tweet, Bajwa said that it has created 305 local jobs so far, adding that the project was being pushed by companyâ€™s own equity to prevent time loss.
